storyTitle: As HR Manager, I want to create shift templates to achieve standardized shift definitions

testCases.title: Validate successful creation of a shift template with valid times
preconditions: User is logged in as HR Manager
User has appropriate role-based permissions to create shift templates
Shift template management page is accessible
Database connection is active

steps.action: Navigate to shift template creation page
steps.expectedResult: Shift template form is displayed with fields for shift name, start time, end time, and break periods

steps.action: Enter valid start time (e.g., 09:00 AM), end time (e.g., 05:00 PM), and break periods (e.g., 12:00 PM - 01:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: Form accepts inputs without validation errors, all fields display entered values correctly

steps.action: Submit the form by clicking the 'Save' or 'Create' button
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is created successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and the new template appears in the shift templates list

postconditions: New shift template is saved in ShiftTemplates table
Shift template appears in the searchable list
User remains on shift template management page or is redirected to the list view

testCases.title: Prevent creation of overlapping shift templates
preconditions: User is logged in as HR Manager
At least one shift template already exists (e.g., 09:00 AM - 05:00 PM)
User has appropriate role-based permissions to create shift templates
Shift template creation page is accessible

steps.action: Attempt to create a shift template with times overlapping an existing template (e.g., start time 08:00 AM, end time 10:00 AM when 09:00 AM - 05:00 PM exists)
steps.expectedResult: System displays error message indicating overlap with existing template and prevents creation

steps.action: Adjust times to non-overlapping values (e.g., start time 06:00 AM, end time 08:00 AM)
steps.expectedResult: Form accepts inputs without errors, validation error message is cleared

steps.action: Submit the form by clicking the 'Save' or 'Create' button
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is created successfully and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: Non-overlapping shift template is saved in ShiftTemplates table
Original overlapping template remains unchanged
New template appears in the shift templates list

testCases.title: Edit and delete existing shift templates
preconditions: User is logged in as HR Manager
At least one shift template exists in the system
User has appropriate role-based permissions to edit and delete shift templates
Shift template list page is accessible

steps.action: Select an existing shift template from the list by clicking on it or clicking an 'Edit' button
steps.expectedResult: Template details are displayed in an editable form showing current start time, end time, and break periods

steps.action: Modify template details (e.g., change end time from 05:00 PM to 06:00 PM) and click 'Save' button
steps.expectedResult: Changes are saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and updated template appears in the list with modified values

steps.action: Click 'Delete' button for the shift template
steps.expectedResult: System displays a confirmation prompt asking to confirm deletion

steps.action: Confirm deletion by clicking 'Yes' or 'Confirm' in the confirmation dialog
steps.expectedResult: Template is deleted from the system, confirmation message is displayed, and template is removed from the list

postconditions: Edited template changes are persisted in ShiftTemplates table
Deleted template is removed from ShiftTemplates table
Shift template list reflects the deletion
User remains on shift template management page

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to search and filter shift templates to achieve efficient template management

testCases.title: Search shift templates by name
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduler
User has appropriate role-based permissions to view shift templates
Multiple shift templates exist in the system with different names
Shift template list page is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to shift template list page
steps.expectedResult: List of all shift templates is displayed with columns showing template name, start time, end time, and other attributes

steps.action: Enter a keyword in the search box (e.g., 'Morning' to find morning shift templates)
steps.expectedResult: List updates dynamically to show only templates matching the search keyword, non-matching templates are filtered out

steps.action: Clear search box by deleting the text or clicking a 'Clear' button
steps.expectedResult: Full list of all shift templates is restored and displayed

postconditions: Search functionality returns to default state
All shift templates are visible in the list
No filters are applied

testCases.title: Filter shift templates by start time
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduler
User has appropriate role-based permissions to view shift templates
Multiple shift templates exist with varying start times
Shift template list page is accessible

steps.action: Select a start time filter criterion (e.g., start time = 09:00 AM) from the filter dropdown or input field
steps.expectedResult: List updates to show only templates with the specified start time, other templates are filtered out

steps.action: Combine with search keywords by entering text in the search box (e.g., 'Shift A') while filter is active
steps.expectedResult: List shows only templates matching both the start time filter and the search keyword criteria

steps.action: Remove filters by clearing the filter selection and search box
steps.expectedResult: Full list of all shift templates is displayed again without any filtering applied

postconditions: All filters are cleared
Complete list of shift templates is visible
System is ready for new search or filter operations

testCases.title: Sort shift templates by duration
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduler
User has appropriate role-based permissions to view shift templates
Multiple shift templates exist with different durations
Shift template list page is accessible with sortable columns

steps.action: Click on the duration column header in the shift templates list
steps.expectedResult: Templates are sorted in ascending order by duration (shortest to longest), with a visual indicator (arrow) showing ascending sort

steps.action: Click again on the duration column header
steps.expectedResult: Templates are sorted in descending order by duration (longest to shortest), with visual indicator changing to show descending sort

postconditions: Shift templates remain sorted by duration in descending order
Sort state is maintained until user changes it
All templates remain visible in the sorted list

storyTitle: As HR Manager, I want to validate shift template data to achieve data integrity

testCases.title: Validate time format and logical order
preconditions: User is logged in as HR Manager
User has permission to create shift templates
Shift template creation form is accessible
System validation rules are active on frontend and backend

steps.action: Navigate to shift template creation page
steps.expectedResult: Shift template creation form is displayed with all required fields (shift name, start time, end time, break times)

steps.action: Enter invalid time format in start time field (e.g., '25:00', 'abc', '13:75')
steps.expectedResult: Inline error message is displayed immediately below the start time field indicating 'Invalid time format. Please use HH:mm format (00:00 - 23:59)'

steps.action: Clear the start time field and enter a valid start time (e.g., '09:00')
steps.expectedResult: Error message disappears and field is marked as valid

steps.action: Enter end time earlier than start time (e.g., start time: '09:00', end time: '08:00')
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message is displayed stating 'End time must be after start time'

steps.action: Attempt to submit the form with the invalid end time
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is prevented, error message remains visible, and focus returns to the end time field

steps.action: Correct the end time to a valid time after start time (e.g., '17:00')
steps.expectedResult: Validation error disappears and field is marked as valid

steps.action: Complete all remaining required fields with valid data and submit the form
steps.expectedResult: No validation errors are displayed, form is successfully submitted, and confirmation message appears indicating shift template was created

postconditions: Valid shift template is saved in the system
Shift template appears in the list of available templates
No invalid data is persisted in the database
User remains on shift template management page or is redirected to template list

testCases.title: Prevent overlapping shift templates
preconditions: User is logged in as HR Manager
User has permission to create shift templates
At least one existing shift template is already created (e.g., 'Morning Shift' from 08:00 to 16:00)
Shift template creation form is accessible
Overlap validation is enabled on both frontend and backend

steps.action: Navigate to shift template creation page
steps.expectedResult: Shift template creation form is displayed with all required fields

steps.action: Enter shift template name (e.g., 'Mid-Day Shift')
steps.expectedResult: Shift name is accepted and field shows valid state

steps.action: Attempt to create a shift template with times that overlap an existing template (e.g., start time: '10:00', end time: '18:00' when existing shift is 08:00-16:00)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message is displayed stating 'Shift template overlaps with existing template: Morning Shift (08:00 - 16:00). Please adjust the times.'

steps.action: Attempt to submit the form with overlapping times
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, error message remains visible, and no data is sent to the backend

steps.action: Adjust the start time to a non-overlapping value (e.g., start time: '16:00', end time: '23:00')
steps.expectedResult: Validation error disappears and fields are marked as valid

steps.action: Complete all remaining required fields and submit the form
steps.expectedResult: Form is successfully submitted without errors, confirmation message is displayed, and new shift template is created

steps.action: Verify the newly created shift template appears in the shift template list
steps.expectedResult: New shift template 'Mid-Day Shift' (16:00 - 23:00) is visible in the list alongside existing templates without any overlap conflicts

postconditions: Non-overlapping shift template is successfully saved in the system
No overlapping shift templates exist in the database
Both shift templates are available for schedule assignment
System maintains data integrity with no conflicting time ranges
